Protocols/CLUWritable.html#/c:objc(pl)CL.name: -isReadyForWriting
Protocols/CLUWritable.html#/c:objc(pl)CL.abstract: Get writer status, whether Writer is ready to write new data or not

Protocols/CLUWritable.html#/c:objc(pl)CL.name: -finishWriting
Protocols/CLUWritable.html#/c:objc(pl)CL.abstract: Finish actual writing with all necessary cleanup

Protocols/CLUWritable.html#/c:objc(pl)CL.name: -startWriting
Protocols/CLUWritable.html#/c:objc(pl)CL.abstract: Start actual writing with all necessary preparations

Protocols/CLUViewRecordableProperties.ht.name: -clue_viewPropertiesDictionary
Protocols/CLUViewRecordableProperties.ht.abstract: Get NSMutableDictionary object with all properties and subviews of current UIView (or any subclass) object

Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.name: -initWithWriter:
Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.abstract: Initialize recordable module with specific writer which implements CLUWritable protocol. So module will be able to record/write required information.

Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.name: -startRecording
Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.abstract: Start recording for current recordable module. Usually you can do all preparations here and start actual recording (which is specific for your recordable module).

Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.name: -stopRecording
Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.abstract: Stop recording for current recordable module. Usually you can do all cleanup here and stop actual recording (which is specific for your recordable module).

Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.name: -addNewFrameWithTimestamp:
Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html#/c:ob.abstract: This method will be called by third-party (see CLUReportComposer) when new frame with new timestamp is available. So usually your module needs to handle all recording related operations here and setup specific timestamp for new data entity.

Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.name: -networkRequestDidRedirectWithResponse:newRequest:
Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.abstract: Tells current delegate object that some network request was redirected

Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.name: -networkRequestDidCompleteWithError:
Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.abstract: Tells current delegate object that some network request did complete with specific NSError error

Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.name: -networkRequestDidReceiveResponse:
Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.abstract: Tells current delegate object that network request did receive NSURLResponse response

Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.name: -networkRequestDidReceiveData:
Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.abstract: Tells current delegate object that network request did receive NSData data

Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.name: -touchesBegan:
Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.abstract: Tells current delegate object that one or more new touches occurred

Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.name: -touchesMoved:
Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.abstract: Tells current delegate object that moved gesture occured. Called only once at the end of moved event.

Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.name: -touchesEnded:
Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.abstract: Tells current delegate object that one or more fingers are raised

Protocols/CLUInfoModule.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -initWithWriter:
Protocols/CLUInfoModule.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Initialize info module with specific writer which implements CLUWritable protocol. So module will be able to record/write required information.

Protocols/CLUInfoModule.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -recordInfoData
Protocols/CLUInfoModule.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Record actual information once and cleanup everything

Protocols/CLUInfoModule.html.name: CLUInfoModule
Protocols/CLUInfoModule.html.abstract: CLUInfoModule protocol describe info modules (like Device Info module or Exception module), static one-time modules which needs to write their data only once during recording.

Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.name: CLUInteractionObserverDelegate
Protocols/CLUInteractionObserverDelegate.abstract: CLUInteractionObserverDelegate protocol describe delegate methods which will handle all touches events sent by custom gesture recognizer (see CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer)

Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.name: CLUNetworkObserverDelegate
Protocols/CLUNetworkObserverDelegate.htm.abstract: CLUNetworkObserverDelegate protocol describe delegate methods which will handle all network operations events sent by custom NSURLProtocol (see CLUURLProtocol and CLUURLProtocolConfiguration)

Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html.name: CLURecordableModule
Protocols/CLURecordableModule.html.abstract: CLURecordableModule protocol describe recordable module (like Video, View Structure, Network modules etc) which needs to track or inspect some specific information over time (like view structure for example) and record this information with specific timestamp using Writers

Protocols/CLUViewRecordableProperties.ht.name: CLUViewRecordableProperties
Protocols/CLUViewRecordableProperties.ht.abstract: CLUViewRecordableProperties protocol describe common interface for UIView’s (and all subclasses) properties parsing into dictionary which will be used in JSON encoding to the specific file.

Protocols/CLUWritable.html.name: CLUWritable
Protocols/CLUWritable.html.abstract: CLUWritable protocol describe writers (like CLUDataWriter or CLUVideoWriter) which needs to actually write new data to specific file (could be text file, video file etc.)

Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -handleShake:
Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Handle shake gesture. Which will start recording if it’s stopped or stop it if it’s recording now

Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -enable
Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Enable Clue. Recording will start only with enabled Clue

Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -disable
Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Disable Clue. Clue won’t start recording if it’s disabled.

Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -enableWithOptions:
Classes/ClueController.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Enable Clue with CLUOptions options (like receiver’s email). Recording will start only with enabled Clue

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: viewSize
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Size of final video. Depends on recorded view size

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: scale
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Current device’s screen scale. To generate bitmap with correct size depending on scale

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: outputURL
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: URL of the final video file where Video Writer will save final recorded file

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -initWithOutputURL:viewSize:scale:
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Create new instance of Video Writer with scpecific output URL, view size and scale

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -appendPixelBuffer:forTimestamp:
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Append pixel buffer, current top view representation as a pixel buffer (See [UIView drawViewHierarchyInRect:afterScreenUpdates:] for drawing view Hierarchy on specific context) for specific timestamp

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: -bitmapContextForPixelBuffer:
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: Create CGContextRef Bitmap context with correct width, height, color space and bytes per row for specific pixel buffer

Classes/CLUDataWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.name: outputURL
Classes/CLUDataWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.abstract: URL of the file where CLUDataWriter will save recorded data

Classes/CLUDataWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.name: -initWithOutputURL:
Classes/CLUDataWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.abstract: Create new instance of Data Writer with specific output URL

Classes/CLUDataWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.name: -addData:
Classes/CLUDataWriter.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.abstract: Add NSData with entity’s properties json dictionary to file at CLUDataWriter.outputURL URL

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.name: -setTarget:andAction:
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.abstract: Specify target and action which would be triggered in case of countdown timer timeout or user press on the view.

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.name: -setWaitingMode:
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.abstract: Switch CLURecordIndicatorView to waiting mode where user will see Waiting… text on the indicator.

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.name: -startCountdownTimerWithMaxTime:
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.abstract: Start countdown timer with specific amount of time. Which will perform target and action at the timeout

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.name: -stopCountdownTimer
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html#/c:o.abstract: Stop immediately countdown timer and invalidate it

Classes/CLUURLProtocolConfiguration.html.name: delegate
Classes/CLUURLProtocolConfiguration.html.abstract: Delegate instance of CLUNetworkObserverDelegate to be able to redirect network communication from CLUURLProtocol to appropriate delegate method

Classes/CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer.html.name: -setObserverDelegate:
Classes/CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer.html.abstract: Set CLUInteractionObserverDelegate delegate to handle gesture recognizer’s events

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: recordableModulesDirectoryURL
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: URL of recordable modules directory Modules inside .clue package file

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: infoModulesDirectoryURL
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: URL of static modules directory Info inside .clue package file

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: reportDirectoryURL
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: URL of final .clue file which located in tmp directory of current application

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: reportZipURL
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: URL of .clue zip file which located in tmp directory of current application.

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: -createReportFile
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Create new report file with UUID as a name and with configured structure (with created Modules and Info subdirectories)

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: -removeReportFile
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Remove report file with all subdirectories inside

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: -createZipReportFile
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Create zip archive file with .clue report file inside

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.name: -isReportZipFileAvailable
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Check if report zip file is available at CLUReportFileManager.reportZipURL

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.name: +showRecordIndicatorInViewController:withMaxTime:target:andAction:
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.abstract: Show CLURecordIndicatorView view object with animation in specific UIViewController, with target and action for specific amount of time. After time has passed - target & action get triggered.

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.name: +switchRecordIndicatorToWaitingMode
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.abstract: Switch CLURecordIndicatorView to waiting mode where user will see Waiting… text on the indicator.

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.name: +currentViewController
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.abstract: Get current UIViewController which is on top of view controller’s stack if there is some available.

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.name: +defaultMaxTime
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.abstract: Get default maximum time for CLURecordIndicatorView view. It’s also default time for report recording.

Classes/CLUMailHelper.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.name: -initWithOption:
Classes/CLUMailHelper.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.abstract: Create new instance of CLUMailHelper with configured options (which contains email where CLUMailHelper will send mail with .clue report)

Classes/CLUMailHelper.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.name: -showMailComposeWindowWithViewController:
Classes/CLUMailHelper.html#/c:objc(cs)CL.abstract: Show mail composer modal view for specific view controller

Classes/CLUVideoModule.html#/c:objc(cs)C.name: isRecording
Classes/CLUVideoModule.html#/c:objc(cs)C.abstract: BOOL property which indicates whether video recording has started or not

Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.name: isRecording
Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: BOOL property which indicates whether video recording has started or not

Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.name: currentTimeStamp
Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Current available timestamp. This property updating constantly with addNewFrameWithTimestamp: from CLURecordableModule protocol

Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -isBufferEmpty
Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Indicate whether data buffer empty or not

Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -addData:
Classes/CLUObserveModule.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Add new NSData object to buffer, so it could be saved to file via Writer on next iteration of addNewFrameWithTimestamp: from CLURecordableModule protocol

Classes/CLUExceptionInfoModule.html#/c:o.name: exception
Classes/CLUExceptionInfoModule.html#/c:o.abstract: This NSException exception object will be be recorded

Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.name: locationInWindow
Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.abstract: The current location of the touch in the coordinate system of the screen

Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.name: tapCount
Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.abstract: Amount of touch down within a certain point within a certain amount of time

Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.name: -initWithTouch:
Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.abstract: Create new instance of CLUTouch object with data from UITouch object

Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.name: -properties
Classes/CLUTouch.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUTouc.abstract: Generate serialized properties dictionary with all required values there locationInWindow and tapCount

Classes/CLUOptions.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUOp.name: email
Classes/CLUOptions.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUOp.abstract: Email address where user will send an email with recorded report attached to it.

Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.name: infoModules
Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: All info modules which will record their data only once during recording

Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.name: recordableModules
Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: All recordable modules which will record their data during recording with specific timestamp for each new data entity

Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.name: isRecording
Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: BOOL property which is indicate whether record has started or not

Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.name: -initWithModulesArray:
Classes/CLUReportComposer.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Initialize new CLUReportComposer instance with recordable modules array. So you can do recording even without info modules, but you have to have recordable modules for report recording

Classes/CLUReportComposer.html.name: CLUReportComposer
Classes/CLUReportComposer.html.abstract: CLUReportComposer is a class responsible for composing final Clue report from many pieces/modules. This class initialize all recordable and info modules and actually start recording. CLUReportComposer also calling addNewFrameWithTimestamp: method from CLURecordableModule protocol for every recordable module and recordInfoData method from CLUInfoModule protocol for every info module.

Classes/CLUOptions.html.name: CLUOptions
Classes/CLUOptions.html.abstract: CLUOptions is a data model class to store all configurational variables during Clue framework setup and enable process.

Classes/CLUTouch.html.name: CLUTouch
Classes/CLUTouch.html.abstract: @brief CLUTouch is a proxy for UITouch data and properties dictionary generator for this data.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUDeviceInfoMod.name: CLUDeviceInfoModule
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUDeviceInfoMod.abstract: CLUDeviceInfoModule is a info module (with static, one-time informations) for current devices’ information recording on start.

Classes/CLUExceptionInfoModule.html.name: CLUExceptionInfoModule
Classes/CLUExceptionInfoModule.html.abstract: CLUExceptionInfoModule is a info module (with static, one-time informations) for unexpected exception recording if occurred.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUNetworkModule.name: CLUNetworkModule
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUNetworkModule.abstract: CLUNetworkModule is a subclass of CLUObserveModule for network operations recording (like responses, requests and errors) for any specific time. It will listen for all network operations via custom NSURLProtocol subclass (see CLUURLProtocol) and CLUURLProtocol will send them to CLUNetworkObserverDelegate methods so CLUNetworkModule can add this data to buffer with specific timestamp

Classes/CLUObserveModule.html.name: CLUObserveModule
Classes/CLUObserveModule.html.abstract: CLUObserveModule is a base class for all modules which needs to observe their data (except CLUVideoModule module) and record them only if new data has arrived (like CLUNetworkModule or CLUUserInteractionModule modules) or something changed with next frame iteration (like CLUViewStructureModule module). This class is responsible for thread safety of new data writing via Writers and Data buffer management.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUUserInteracti.name: CLUUserInteractionModule
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUUserInteracti.abstract: CLUUserInteractionModule is a subclass of CLUObserveModule for user interactions recording (like touches) for any specific time. It will listen for all gestures/touches via custom gesture recognizer and recognizer will send them to CLUInteractionObserverDelegate methods so CLUUserInteractionModule can add this data to buffer with specific timestamp

Classes/CLUVideoModule.html.name: CLUVideoModule
Classes/CLUVideoModule.html.abstract: CLUVideoModule is a class (module) for screen recording which implements CLURecordableModule protocol. It’s responsible for thread safety while video recording, operations with CVPixelBufferRef and current view hierarchy drawing (see [UIView drawViewHierarchyInRect:afterScreenUpdates:]) and frames overlapping while recording.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUViewStructure.name: CLUViewStructureModule
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUViewStructure.abstract: CLUViewStructureModule is a subclass of CLUObserveModule for view hierarchy recording for any specific time. It will record all views currently present on the top view controller (properties of those views and their subviews as well). Also CLUViewStructureModule keep track of last recorded view structure so it won’t record same view structure twice.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUMailDelegate.name: CLUMailDelegate
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUMailDelegate.abstract: CLUMailDelegate is delegate class to handle responses/events from mail composer modal view.

Classes/CLUMailHelper.html.name: CLUMailHelper
Classes/CLUMailHelper.html.abstract: CLUMailHelper is class responsible for mail sending process. Set mail subject, add .clue report zip file in attachment and show mail compose modal view for specific viewController

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.name: CLURecordIndicatorViewManager
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorViewManager.ht.abstract: CLURecordIndicatorViewManager is a class which show CLURecordIndicatorView view object for specific amount of time, hide it and switch modes of CLURecordIndicatorView. Also return useful view related information like current top view controller in stack.

Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html.name: CLUReportFileManager
Classes/CLUReportFileManager.html.abstract: CLUReportFileManager is a singleton class responsible for managing final report .clue file and interact which it on file system level

Classes/CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer.html.name: CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer
Classes/CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer.html.abstract: CLUGeneralGestureRecognizer is a subclass of UIGestureRecognizer to intercept all user gestures and interactions during report recording and redirect them to appropriate delegate method from CLUInteractionObserverDelegate

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUURLProtocol.name: CLUURLProtocol
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)CLUURLProtocol.abstract: CLUURLProtocol is a subclass of abstract NSURLProtocol to intercept all network requests during report recording and redirect them to appropriate delegate method from CLUNetworkObserverDelegate using CLUURLProtocolConfiguration singleton class

Classes/CLUURLProtocolConfiguration.html.name: CLUURLProtocolConfiguration
Classes/CLUURLProtocolConfiguration.html.abstract: CLUURLProtocolConfiguration is a singleton class which keeps custom network configuration (like CLUNetworkObserverDelegate delegate)

Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html.name: CLURecordIndicatorView
Classes/CLURecordIndicatorView.html.abstract: CLURecordIndicatorView is a view object to indicate recording process to user, will appear at the top of the screen, right after statusBar

Classes/CLUDataWriter.html.name: CLUDataWriter
Classes/CLUDataWriter.html.abstract: CLUDataWriter class which responsible for all writing and saving process for regular data stream into final .json file (inside .clue report file)

Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html.name: CLUVideoWriter
Classes/CLUVideoWriter.html.abstract: CLUVideoWriter class which responsible for all writing and saving process for video stream from device’s screen.

Classes/ClueController.html.name: ClueController
Classes/ClueController.html.abstract: ClueController is a singleton class and main Clue controller which is also the only public interface for framework user. Here user can turn on/off Clue and start/stop report recording.

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: -clue_colorPropertyDictionaryForColor:
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: Generate color dictionary which includes red, green, blue and alpha value of specific color

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: -clue_sizePropertyDictionaryForSize:
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: Generate size dictionary which includes width and height of specific size

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: -clue_fontPropertyDictionaryForFont:
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: Generate font dictionary which includes familyName, fontName, pointSize and lineHeight of specific font

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: -clue_attributedTextPropertyDictionaryForAttributedString:
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: Generate attributed string dictionary which includes string object of specific attributed string

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: -clue_layoutMarginsPropertyDictionary
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: Generate layout margin dictionary which includes left, top, right and bottom margins for current UIView object

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: -clue_frameProprtyDictionary
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: Generate frame dictionary which includes x, y, width and height for current UIView object

Categories/NSURLResponse(CLUNetworkAddit.name: -clue_responseProperties
Categories/NSURLResponse(CLUNetworkAddit.abstract: Generate URL response dictionary which includes class name, MIME type, URL and expectedContentLength for current NSURLResponse object

Categories/NSURLRequest(CLUNetworkAdditi.name: -clue_requestProperties
Categories/NSURLRequest(CLUNetworkAdditi.abstract: Generate URL request dictionary which includes class name, URL, allHTTPHeaderFields, HTTPMethod, HTTPShouldHandleCookies and HTTPBody for current NSURLRequest object

Categories/NSHTTPURLResponse(CLUNetworkA.name: -clue_responseProperties
Categories/NSHTTPURLResponse(CLUNetworkA.abstract: Generate HTTP URL response dictionary which includes properties from URL Response and statusCode, localizedStringForStatusCode, allHeaderFields for current NSHTTPURLResponse object

Categories/NSException(CLUExceptionAddit.name: -clue_exceptionProperties
Categories/NSException(CLUExceptionAddit.abstract: Generate exception dictionary which includes name, reason, userInfo, callStackReturnAddresses and callStackSymbols for current NSException object

Categories/NSError(CLUNetworkAdditions)..name: -clue_errorProperties
Categories/NSError(CLUNetworkAdditions)..abstract: Generate error dictionary which includes error class name, code, domain, userInfo, localizedDescription and localizedFailureReason for current NSError object

Categories/NSError(CLUNetworkAdditions)..name: NSError(CLUNetworkAdditions)
Categories/NSError(CLUNetworkAdditions)..abstract: NSError (CLUNetworkAdditions) category contains method to parse NSError properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories/NSException(CLUExceptionAddit.name: NSException(CLUExceptionAdditions)
Categories/NSException(CLUExceptionAddit.abstract: NSException (CLUExceptionAdditions) category contains method to parse NSException properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories/NSHTTPURLResponse(CLUNetworkA.name: NSHTTPURLResponse(CLUNetworkAdditions)
Categories/NSHTTPURLResponse(CLUNetworkA.abstract: NSHTTPURLResponse (CLUNetworkAdditions) category contains method to parse NSHTTPURLResponse properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories/NSURLRequest(CLUNetworkAdditi.name: NSURLRequest(CLUNetworkAdditions)
Categories/NSURLRequest(CLUNetworkAdditi.abstract: NSURLRequest (CLUNetworkAdditions) category contains method to parse NSURLRequest properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories/NSURLResponse(CLUNetworkAddit.name: NSURLResponse(CLUNetworkAdditions)
Categories/NSURLResponse(CLUNetworkAddit.abstract: NSURLResponse (CLUNetworkAdditions) category contains method to parse NSURLResponse properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories.html#/c:objc(cy)UIImageView@C.name: UIImageView(CLUViewRecordableAdditions)
Categories.html#/c:objc(cy)UIImageView@C.abstract: UIImageView (CLUViewRecordableAdditions) category contains methods to parse UIImageView properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories.html#/c:objc(cy)UILabel@CLUVi.name: UILabel(CLUViewRecordableAdditions)
Categories.html#/c:objc(cy)UILabel@CLUVi.abstract: UILabel (CLUViewRecordableAdditions) category contains methods to parse UILabel properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories.html#/c:objc(cy)UITextField@C.name: UITextField(CLUViewRecordableAdditions)
Categories.html#/c:objc(cy)UITextField@C.abstract: UITextField (CLUViewRecordableAdditions) category contains methods to parse UITextField properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.name: UIView(CLUViewRecordableAdditions)
Categories/UIView(CLUViewRecordableAddit.abstract: UIView (CLUViewRecordableAdditions) category contains metho to parse UIView properties and encode them into json like dictionary

Categories.html.name: Categories
Categories.html.abstract: The following categories are available globally.

Classes.html.name: Classes
Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.

Protocols.html.name: Protocols
Protocols.html.abstract: The following protocols are available globally.
